basic_information.scholarship_name: Carl Edward Northam Memorial Scholarship for Pre-Med

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to the students within the College of Mathematics and Science majoring in Biology, Chemistry or Physics with the intent to continue their education to obtain a medical degree. Eligibility Requirements College of Mathematics and Science student Undergraduate student Biology, Chemistry, or Physics major Intent to continue education to obtain a medical degree 3.5 GPA or above Two letters of faculty recommendation/support

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
